main event: On June 9, 1951, a UFO sighting was reported in Mikkeli, Finland involving a disc-shaped object.
interesting points: The object was described as aluminum colored, 2 meters in diameter, and flying at a speed of 800 mph., It showed a straight and level flight path with no noise., Lt. Kalimeri and 3 other observers noted a similar sighting involving a round object with a red light and changing direction., The observers estimated this object to be 4-5 meters in diameter and traveling at a speed of 700 to 1,000 km/hr., The sighting included a brief observation time of 2 to 3 minutes.
sighted object: disc-shaped and round object with a red light
